summary: Experienced Software Engineer with a strong background in developing scalable web applications and working across the full stack. Skilled in various programming languages and frameworks, with a passion for continuous learning and improvement.

responsibilities: Led a team of 5 engineers to develop and maintain a scalable web application serving over 1 million users.
Implemented RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, improving the performance of data retrieval operations by 30%.
Collaborated with the front-end team to integrate React components, resulting in a seamless user experience.
Developed and maintained web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Worked on a project to migrate a legacy system to a modern architecture, reducing technical debt by 40%.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to the improvement of coding standards and best practices.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Project Management Tool
projects.description: Developed a web-based project management tool using React and Node.js, allowing users to track and manage their projects efficiently.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Built an e-commerce platform using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, providing a user-friendly interface for online shopping.
